name: Gaia's Cradle | Global Game Jam 2023 entry
name_original: Gaia's Cradle | Global Game Jam 2023 entry
description:
You play as a dryad, and you have to save a tree from being attacked in this tile based turn-based arcade experience. You can use abilities to prevent the enemies from reaching the tree, pay attention to the enemies, they move like chess pieces.

HOW TO CONTROL

If you click on the character, and an enemy is on the tiles range, you can block them for a few turns.
You can move only one time at a time, in a 3x3 grid around the player.
You can also click on a free tile away from the player to throw a seed and block an enemy.

Caio Flávio - Programming
Fellipe Eugenio - Level Design/Game Design
Fernando Muniz - Sound
Richard Novak - Art
